metadata.title: CVE-2012-1093 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
The init script in the Debian x11-common package before 1:7.6+12 isvulnerable to a symlink attack that can lead to a privilege escalationduring package installation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-1093` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

x11-common - 1:7.7+19ubuntu7
xbase-clients - 1:7.7+19ubuntu7
xorg - 1:7.7+19ubuntu7
xserver-xorg - 1:7.7+19ubuntu7
xserver-xorg-input-all - 1:7.7+19ubuntu7
xserver-xorg-video-all - 1:7.7+19ubuntu7
xutils - 1:7.7+19ubuntu7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xorg package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:7.7+19ubuntu7').
